nodes.text: The P-2B Assault Droid was a model of three-legged battle droid available during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. The P-2B was designed solely to dominate the battlefield, and could be upgraded to use plasma cell ammo. The Twi'lek arms dealer Olok the Shadow sold P-2B Assault Droids in his auction on Darvannis.

P-2B Assault Droids appear as one of the four types of droid enemies in the Olok the Shadow boss encounter in the Operation "Scum and Villainy," which was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Digital Expansion Rise of the Hutt Cartel.
